examples.title: Simple Propositional Logic
examples.description: Basic propositional inference: p → q, q → r, p ⊢ r

examples.title: Right Identity
examples.description: Prove right identity from left identity and inverse

examples.title: Right Inverse
examples.description: Prove right inverse from left inverse and identity

examples.title: Uniqueness of Identity
examples.description: Prove that the identity element is unique

examples.title: Uniqueness of Inverse
examples.description: Prove that inverse elements are unique

examples.title: Inverse of Identity
examples.description: Prove that the inverse of identity is identity

examples.title: Order 2 Implies Abelian
examples.description: Prove that a group where every element has order 2 is abelian
